ygData.subject: Re: Quest Help(riverdale)
ygData.msgSnippet: heh your in for a hell of a battle if you go for it... its all located on the ogres in West karanas about four guards (i believe they are SKs not sure though),
ygData.messageBody:
heh your in for a hell of a battle if you go for it... its all located on
the ogres in West karanas about four guards (i believe they are SKs not sure
though), two shamans and a chief..... guards are low 20s... shamans are mid
20s and chief is 34th level I believe..... The problem with hunting this
area is it takes 2 full groups of upper 20s/30s to clear it... one full
group of 30s might be able to do it but the shamans and i believe chief can
charm.... so that usually devastates most groups...

Its a tough battle... nothing is really worth the fight except the chipped
bone braclets and maybe the collar....
the Bone armor is great AC for druids (only druids ; anyone else would be
dumb to wear this stuff)..... but the stats arent great and its heavy...
like i believe either the legs or arms are 5 to str but neg. 4 to agi
etc.... you always have a negative bonus coupled with a positive... so some
druids seek this stuff out for the Armor class but theres better bonuses
armor out there....

<reason i said only druids because shamans/clerics and other classes can
wear plate/chain type armor that is overall better AC then this stuff.... on
the other hand druids are pretty limited to what they can wear AC wise>

>
>glowing bone collar ac5 plus 25 hp 25 plus mana
>bone armplates ac5 plus 5 stenght -4 dex
>chipped bone braclet ac4 wisdom plus 5
>

weight
>but where in west karana do i get it on what kinda monster and what level..
>
>
>thankyou for your time Ventura (rallos)
